data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ruiz, Alexander Sánchez, Brescovit, Antonio D. (2013): The genus Loxosceles Heineken & Lowe (Araneae: Sicariidae) in Cuba and Hispaniola, West Indies. Zootaxa 3731 (2): 212-222, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3731.2.2
